original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan Police Illegal Assets Investigations Division seized property worth over 55 million rupees belonging to recently arrested drug trafficker Mattakkuliye Kudu Roshan.
The seized assets include a luxury house in Kotugoda, Ja Ela, and a high-end vehicle in Kudu Roshan's possession.
The operation comes less than 48 hours after Kudu Roshan's arrest in Warakapola
India, South Korea Eye Joint Development Projects in Sri Lanka, Bangladesh
